page.title: 20POLICING IN TIBBERTON 2
page.content:
{COMMUNICATIONS}-W.P.C.Adams has been policing in Tibberton for three years. Over that time she has not noticed any great changes in the country,except many of the trees have died and two new houses have been built. In the rural areas,like hers,a great emphasis is put on making contract with the community. She does this by going to talks and mettings-functions laid on by groups like the Women's Institute-School contacts, such as cycling proficiency tests and by talking to people in the streets.
{BISHOP PEROWNE HIGH SCHOOL JULY 1985 }
